column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My favorite deep dish.  This place is the standard
column2: and the best part about Lou's is that their various locations are highly consistent.  One tends to be as quality as the other.  My favorite is The Lou
column3: add sausage.  The Lou's salad is great too
column5: with all the blue cheese and bacon bits
column6: but very tasty.  Loves me my Lou's.
